title: Use AI like a pro with this ChatGPT training package, now under $25
content:
Macworld

We’ve been touting the virtues of ChatGPT since last year. However, if you’re still not up to speed on everything AI can do to help fuel your creativity and increase productivity, you can unlock ChatGPT’s full potential with the training from this comprehensive ChatGPT and AI training bundle.

Featuring more than four hours of content, this bundle offers the knowledge to truly harness the full power of AI, whether you’re a beginner or already an experienced user.

Taught by instructors like renowned cloud computing teacher Mike Wheeler, these courses dive into what ChatGPT can do. In ChatGPT for Beginners, learners get tips for writing compelling prompts, which in turn creates more persuasive copy. With “ChatGPT: Artificial Intelligence (AI) that Writes for You,” you’ll learn how professionals use ChatGPT to create engaging websites, email newsletters, and more.

Tech-savvy users can even learn to build their own ChatGPT AI bot using Tkinter and Django with Python. They’ll learn how themes and styles work in Tkinter, how to have AI suggest code edits, and more.

Grab this Complete ChatGPT and Artificial Intelligence Training Bundle for just $24.97 until January 14 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon necessary! 

 

The Complete ChatGPT Artificial Intelligence OpenAI Training Bundle

Only $24.97 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.
